Annotation_Schema_TAZ_v1.0.TEXT: [s0] Griffin: Are you guys good? [s1] Are you guys ready to be whisked away? [s2] Clint: Uh— [s3] Travis: Whisk, whisk, whisk. [s22] Griffin: No, you have nothing to worry about. [s23] So, um, at the end of the last episode you encountered these three people. [s24] You, uh, see a half-elf guy with a big old long-bow dressed in pelts, with a short, shaggy, uh, beard and dark red hair. [s25] There’s an elven woman with, uh, dark purple hair and she’s got a gnarled wooden staff and the same sort of pelt armor.
